[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” full_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1676860321549{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-image: url(https://pakmagnesia.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/about-banner.jpg?id=146) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”specialist”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1674955415272{padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Magnesium Oxide Applications” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:35px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:43px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Magnesium Oxide is used in several industrial applications including[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1676849900808{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #1e66a6 !important;}” el_class=”about-home”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1674875971273{padding-right: 100px !important;padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Applications” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:38px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_row_inner el_class=”text-white”][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Abrasives

Magnesium serves as a binder in grinding wheels.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Animal feed supplement

Magnesium provides essential nutrition to livestock and poultry.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Boiler (oil-fired) additives

Magnesium-containing materials can be added to oil-fired boilers to reduce corrosion of steel pipes holding steam and sulfur emissions.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Chemicals

Magnesium is a starting point for the production of other magnesium salts such as sulfate and nitrate.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Coatings

Magnesium is used as a pigment extender in paint and varnish.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Construction (MgO Board):

Magnesium oxide is used as a basic ingredient in oxychloride cements that are used for flooring, wallboard, fiberboard, and tile.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”text-white”][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Fertilizers

Magnesium is a source of essential nutrients for plant nutrition.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Foundries

Magnesium serves as a catalyst and water acceptor in shell molding.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Glass manufacture

Magnesium is used as an ingredient for specialty, scientific, and decorative glassware and fiberglass.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Insulation

Magnesium is used to make light, flexible mats for insulating pipes.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Lubricating oils

Magnesium can be added as an additive to neutralize acids in lubricating oils.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Electrical

Magnesium is used as a semiconductor and as an insulating filler between wire and outer sheath in heating elements.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”text-white”][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Pharmaceuticals

Special grades of magnesium hydroxide, oxide, and carbonate are used in antacids, cosmetics, toothpaste, and ointments

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Plastics manufacture

Magnesium is used as a filler, acid acceptor, thickener catalyst, and pigment extender in plastic production.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Refractory and ceramics

Magnesium is a basic ingredient in product formulations for the steel industry.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Rubber compounding

Magnesium is used as a filler, acid acceptor, anti-scorch ingredient, curing aid, and pigment in rubber production.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

Steel industry

Magnesium is used in the annealing process and as a coating for grain-oriented silicon steel used in electrical transformers.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1676850014407{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”“They look to the future for the welfare of future generations”” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:30px|text_align:center|color:%231e66a6|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”Dr. Paul Lohmann®” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26px|text_align:center|color:%233578ae|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1674956626513{margin-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Coming from the EcoVadis 2022 Gold medalist,
this is not another compliment -it is a recognition.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1676848770526{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”A Snapshot Of The Industries We Serve” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:35px|text_align:center|color:%231e66a6|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1675006356686{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1676850041617{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-image: url(https://pakmagnesia.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/research_header.jpg?id=58) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”specialist specialist1″][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1674955415272{padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”R & D
Thirsty For
New Solutions” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:35px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:43px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Next to our expertise in mineral exploration, mining, processing and delivering high quality magnesite products, we do a lot of R&D work. We place special emphasis on research and development and our dedicated R&D center has been operating for the last 3 decades. Our R&D plays a critical role in delivering and shaping corporate strategy by combining market input with scientific insights to improve existing products and develop innovative and high added value products.

READ MORE[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1676850053276{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;}” el_class=”news-home”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1674875971273{padding-right: 100px !important;padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Magnesite Stories” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:center|color:%231e66a6|line_height:38px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_basic_grid post_type=”post” max_items=”6″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1684596924178-c2809b42-c51c-10″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
